name: Decision_Tree_Fit_CV
label: Decision Tree Fit with CV
description: Builds the decision tree model with cross-validation fitting the provided learning data.

name: sklearn_decision_tree_fit_cv
label: Decision Tree Fit with CV
description: Builds the decision tree model with the best hyperparameters found through cross-validation fitting the provided learning data: fits a population, with the scikit-learn library

inputs.name: population
inputs.label: Population
inputs.description: The population is defined from an object with IKATS type table.

parameters.name: target_column_name
parameters.label: Target
parameters.description: The name of the attribute providing the class label of the observed subject. Must match one of the available population attributes.

parameters.name: identifier_column_name
parameters.label: ID
parameters.description: The name of the attribute identifying each observed subject. Must match one of the available population attributes.

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Name of the table to create
parameters.label: Table name

parameters.name: folds
parameters.label: Number of folds
parameters.description: Number of folds to be used by the cross-validation procedure

parameters.name: depth_parameters
parameters.label: Depth Parameters
parameters.description: List of values for the maximum depth parameter to search on for the DecisionTree algorithm

parameters.name: balanced_parameters
parameters.label: Balanced Parameters
parameters.description: List of values for the class balancing parameter to search on for the DecisionTree algorithm

outputs.name: clf_model
outputs.label: Model
outputs.description: The computed decision tree model: fits the population. This binary content ought to be used by the back-end.

outputs.name: clf_dot
outputs.label: Dot
outputs.description: The dot graph description, matching the computed decision tree model. The language dot describes trees in a plain text format. This description ought to be used by viewer.

outputs.name: clf_best_params
outputs.label: params
outputs.description: The best parameters found by the cross validation method

outputs.name: clf_cv_results
outputs.label: cv_results
outputs.description: The complete results of the cross validation algorithm
